p: Generally, the combination between HF and septic shock would lead to higher mortality rate of 70 to 90% when compared with 20% in septic patients without cardiovascular impairment [ 33]. Available reports estimated that vasoactive agents were required in 35% of the patients in a study from China and up to 67% of the critically ill patients in a study from the USA, although most of them did not present with evidence of shock [ 18, 19].
